website_summaries.verdict: The Panasonic RP-HXD3W on-ear headphones deliver a rich bass response without any distortion, but can sound a bit tinny and overly-sculpted in the high-mids.
cons: Can sound overly sculpted in mids and highs, at times tinny

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Good price for the quality, but the performance leaves something to be desired. If you're a gym goer, the silicone ear cuff doesn't absorb or wick sweat, so you'll have some moisture going on. On the cuff again, it's slightly shallow and likely won't seal well for most people = poor sound isolation.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T.

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great, especially for the price these are at right ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had these headphones for a little over a year now and use them frequently at the gym and at home. The sound is great, especially for the price these are at right now (a little over $20 vs the $60!). The only downside is after wearing them for an extended amount of time, the ear-cups that sit on my ears start to hurt, since they don't have a lot of padding other than the silicone-based covering.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hashimoto-McCreery

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good sound and very comfortable. These are great for when I'd rather not be wearing earbuds or having to worry about anything moving around on me.
customer_reviews.author: Still Reading

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones & they didn't cost a fortune! Really comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Rex Barker Ledon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very well made, comfy, and man, how can you beat the price?
customer_reviews.author: Ben Larkin

customer_reviews.title: IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing. I just got them two days ago and the sound is clear. It blocks out the noise well. They are also aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Nailah1231

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son loves them. Seem to be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hildebrandt

customer_reviews.title: Simply they are comfortable, sound is very good for the pricentire
customer_reviews.text: Simply they are comfortable, sound is very good for the price. Recommended

customer_reviews.title: do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: bad sound, color is not the same as on image, pulls out hair
customer_reviews.author: Serge

customer_reviews.title: keep in mind its a 50 dollar headset
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these and overall I am satisfied. I want to rate them at 3 stars but at the end of the day its 50$ headphones and as such not bad. I did a 3d test on youtube with them and it was fantastic, however the bass test really sucked. They really need to work on the bass. Also another thing i didnt like was theres hardly any noise cancellation but again these are 50$ headphones. All in all I am satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Victor V. Popov

customer_reviews.title: They're not Bose...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones will get the job done in most situations. At work, out for a walk, around the house if you don't want to hear your co-occupants--sure, perfect. They aren't noise-canceling headphones, despite their size; you will hear the guy on the train next to you, and they won't blot out the sound of the engines on an airplane. The padding around your ears could be a bit more plush, but you get what you pay for and these are reasonable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Nelson
